Do you have immunity against the Gold Fever? 
Are you prepared for the Gold temptation? 
What is your "Gold" status? 
Find out all this with the Gold Fever Quiz!
The quiz consists of 7 short questions. \n\"Dig\" down and have fun!
Is it true that in almost every river in Bulgaria has placer gold?
Bulgaria is the second gold mining country in the EU (7914 kg in 2015). \nWhich country ranks first in gold mining in the EU (8342 kg in 2015)?
What is the name of the mineral variety of the native gold, which contains >20 wt. % Ag in its chemical composition?
What is a Carat (Karat in USA and Germany)?
A unit of weight of the Gold.
A unit of purity of the Gold.
A unit of weight of the Diamonds.
A unit of purity of the Diamonds.
Is it true that during the California gold rush, some speculators paid more for an ounce of water than they received for an ounce of Gold?
Absolutely pure Gold is so soft that it can be molded with hands. How many carats is this Gold?
The world\'s largest nugget was found near Dunolly, Australia on 5th of February 1869. The nugget was soon melted down into ingots and shipped to the Bank of England. How much it was weighed?
